clips.title: N.Y. launches HIV self-test giveaway campaign to address disparities, DOH says
clips.preview: Thursday, Jun. 27 is recognized as National HIV Testing Day. A digital HIV awareness campaign has been launched by the New York State Department of Health (DOH) to coincide with the occasion.
clips.creditText: With â€œLevel up your self-love: check your status

clips.title: Man indicted for assaulting child to retaliate against federal trial witness
clips.preview: An 18-year-old Schenectady man was put behind bars for allegedly assaulting a child of a witness who testified in a federal criminal trial, according to the Northern District of New York United States Department of Justice.
